name: academora-workspace
description: Root workspace scripts for Academora client and server

scripts.dev: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$s = Start-Job { npm run dev --prefix 'C:/Users/ayper/Desktop/Projects_Ayoub/Coding/Academora-V0.1/server' }; $c = Start-Job { npm run dev --prefix 'C:/Users/ayper/Desktop/Projects_Ayoub/Coding/Academora-V0.1/client' }; Receive-Job -Wait $s,$c"
